column1: #Text=Eric Bogosian on writing and the creative urge
#Text=Eric Bogosian is one of America 's great multi-dimensional talents . "

#Text=There was that solo stuff , and then I started writing plays in the late seventies .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Although his work has spanned genres , most readers will recognize Bogosian for his acting , which has included a memorable performance in Woody Allen 's Deconstructing Harry to co-writing and starring in the Oliver Stone movie Talk Radio ( based upon his Pulitzer Prize -nominated play ) to playing the bad guy in Under Siege 2 to his current role in Law & Order : Criminal Intent as Captain Danny Ross .

#Text=I avoid what I think of as  furniture roles , " -- I do n't care how large or small the role is .

column1: #Text=For instance , my part in the Woody Allen movie Deconstructing Harry on the page is a small role .
#Text=But it 's a great character , and it 's a memorable character .
#Text=I 'm three of the voices on Beavis & Butthead Do America .
#Text=I have had this really exciting time of being working with Taylor Hackford and Woody Allen and Robert Altman and Paul Schrader .
#Text=But also , Mike Judge , Frank Zappa , Sonic Youth ...
#Text=These are wide-ranging in the different kinds of things I 've worked on .
#Text=Those are some of the more prominent things .
#Text=That play in 1994 was a big deal ; the film that came out of it is a big deal .
#Text=Around 2000 I started doing the books , and now I 'm on my third novel .
#Text=That 's sort of the overview of the whole thing , at least from my perspective .
